attributes.action: respond to any of the petitions listed on this website, and inform us of his response.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that the current government's understanding of public consultations is that they are little more than a form of cheap PR which must be indulged in by the government before they merrily continue  on their predetermined course of action.

The most recent examples of this are the  debates over the replacement of trident and the proposed plans to build more nuclear power stations. 

We would like to petition the PM to respond publically to any of the petitions listed on this website. We also petition him to inform the public of any decisions/initiatives that result from these petitions, in order to set our minds at rest as the the true value of the e-petitions site.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
